website_summaries.verdict: A pack of 100 water purification tablets that can be added to questionable water to kill a variety of microorganisms.
pros: Both the Environmental Protection Agency and the World Health Organization have approved these tablets
When added to water, they can prevent cholera, typhoid, dysentery, and more
It takes roughly 40 minutes to treat the water and the tablets are safe enough to be used for long periods
cons: The tablets are made in batches that have a shelf life of 5 years
It is not unusual to purchase tablets with less than 5 years left before their expiration date

customer_reviews.title: If it works with Kansas lake water, it will work anywhere
customer_reviews.text: These tabs did great! We took our Boy Scouts on a 10 mile Back Pack trip in Kansas. The lake was brown and muddy. We put the water in a collapsible bucket and let it settle, then poured the water into our hydration packs. Then a few tabs and just like they say, you can drink the water. No issues, no worries, worked great.
customer_reviews.author: David Dibble

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, it's worth the buy. The reason for 4 stars is because I prefer my tablets to be in a foil package rather than a paper/foil package. Just in case it gets wet. Other then that it's a good product and the taste isn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy my water purification tabs in small bottles, but when I found out about these, I couldn't be happier. I have multiple survival/convenience kits for various aspects of my life (one in my car, one on my person, one in my EDC bag, etc.). So these are perfect for spreading out the tabs between all the kits. Comes with two tabs per sealed packet. Otherwise, they're just like any other chlorine tablet. They still make the water smell and taste like a public swimming pool, but it sure beats catching parasites.
customer_reviews.author: Randy J. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for catastrophic emergencies.
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived as pictured. Glad this company is selling them for a reasonable price as I am sending them to Puerto Rico so that friends and family affected by Hurricane Maria can have some clean drinking water. The 100 individually packed tabs are going to be handed out to 100 people there.
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Value, good product
customer_reviews.text: Compact, easy to store, and easy to use. We have well water and often lose our power. If that occurs after a bad storm (e.g., hurricane), the water turns a bit murky. While we do run a generator during those times, it's not run 24/7. When we bleach the well, it takes a long time to get the smell out of the water. I'd rather use these tablets dissolved according to instructions in our jugs of drinking water rather than a few drops of bleach in the jugs or a 1/4 cup of bleach in the well. Good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Scam alert
customer_reviews.text: Complete scam! They came in a ziplock bag from a grocery store and have no date on them !!!! They could be 100 yrs old for all I know
customer_reviews.author: H J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and no funky taste
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these and another product to compare. Hiked pikes peak in Colorado and took both along. I absolutely would choose using these over the other product. These didn't have a funky aftertaste. The stream water was clear and I treated my 3ltr camel back with 2 tablets, waited 30 min and my water tasted fresh and clean like spring water is supposed to be. The other product I used in a bottle of water tasted horrible and turned the water orange. These Agua Tabs were hands down the best and the packaging made it easy and lightweight to carry! Instructions were clear and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Angela H

customer_reviews.title: Not as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used these yet, and will need to try them out at home first. The only special problem is that they look old and dirty; the packets aren't in pretty white perf sheets, but individual and shoved into a sandwich bag. Lots of dust and dirt are on both the packets themselves and on the baggie.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Delany

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Ordered purification tablets...received adhesive wall hangers...and it says the item is "non-returnable".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Advertising
customer_reviews.text: This product has misleading advertising. The second picture says it can treat up to 20L of water per tab. However when you receive and look at the packaging you can only treat .75L of water per tab.
customer_reviews.author: Blake R

customer_reviews.title: Its... ok, will work when you have nothing usable
customer_reviews.text: Rain water on the ground from the day before, filled a 2 quart military canteen... dropped two tabs in. (each tablet treated 1 liter). Tastes... well, interesting, surprisingly absent of chlorine, and the little bit of dirt made the water crunchy. Made me queasy especially since I let it sit for an hour and water got warm. But I survived. I'd strain water through a coffee filter first, then use it. I bought 2"x3" zip lock bags and distributed the tabs in backpacks along with folded coffee filters. They will definitely come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Shaofu Chang

customer_reviews.title: Effective without making your water taste weird!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my trek up Mt Kilimanjaro in July. We knew we needed a way to purify the water we would be drinking because it came directly off the mountain. I wasn't sure whether to go with iodine or chlorine but am really glad I chose chlorine! There is hardly any chlorine taste at all with these and they don't stain your Camelback or containers. My husband and I went thru a lot of these that week and some of our friends even used them as well at times. Nobody ever got sick from the water. I would get these again for camping for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jaeger

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: These aquatabs were really easy to use and didn't have a funky taste to them (some taste like chlorine), so in the wilderness we filled our nalgene bottles in the middle of a lake to 750ml, dropped in a tab, shook the bottle a bit, then waited about 35-40 minutes before drinking our water. We were in an area without facilities for 4 days and these tabs helped keep us hydrated. Will for sure use again.
customer_reviews.author: Ali J

customer_reviews.title: These are very light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are very light and easy to use. The water I used it on seemed to be treated as I didn't get sick. This is a much lighter system than my water filter or Mixo system. Great for backpacking
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Jones

customer_reviews.title: 6 month shelf life
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these tablets work. But.... I ordered these for long term storage. The description says up to 5 years. I ordered mine on 4/6/2020, received them 4/16, and they expire 10/2020. Really! 6 months!?! Going to see about returning them.
customer_reviews.author: justine

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unusable garbage! Every single package is opened from water damage! You can tell the packages got wet because the blue writing is smeared and the packaging is warped! The tablets have broken through the packaging. And the clear bag they came in has lots of powder from the tablets. Will not buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmin B

customer_reviews.title: A good addition to any backpack or piece of luggage
customer_reviews.text: These are really good water tabs I highly recommend that if you're going to do any type of backpacking or overseas travel that these are and essential for any pack or piece of luggage just a piece of mind. When traveling in places like Mexico I just fill up a Nalgene bottle drop one of those in there get the water cleaned up so that I can keep it by the sink to brush my teeth take my vitamins etcetera they really do the job well. Would not travel without them nor go backpacking without so I'm as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wilderness1022

customer_reviews.title: A must for every backpacker...
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely a must for everyone who's going on a longer trip. If you don't have time to boil your water to be able to drink it, this will do the trick within 20 or 30 minutes. I keep these on me on every trip and recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Effective on Kathmandu water.
customer_reviews.text: Used these little tablets every day in Nepal to purify local water. The local folks seem to be immune to the local water but one sip of untreated water taught me that I was not. As long as I stuck with the treated stuff I was OK.
customer_reviews.author: telyavelli

customer_reviews.title: AquaTabs water purifier
customer_reviews.text: For ANYONE who lives where storms or earthquakes occur. They should have these on hand in case water is contaminated in some way, just in case they are unable to obtain bottled water or are unable to boil their water. It would also be a wonderful thing to have on hand if backpacking or hiking. I highly recommend these. The ease of use and taste make this a must have for every household.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle DiWilesCustomer

customer_reviews.title: It works, but it tastes chemically
customer_reviews.text: I didn't die drinking water from a river.. so there's that. However, don't expect the water to taste like normal, purified water. It tastes like chemicals. This is a last case resort if you're stranded in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. Came and tiny little packets that look like they were 100 years old
customer_reviews.text: Not as expected. Came in tiny little paper packets that look like they were 100 years old. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: FRAIDNOT67

customer_reviews.title: Still alive!!!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, been using these for several years & my guts haven't escaped my body & gone on a rampage....yet. Taste like treated water, but I actually dont mind it. I know that flavor means my intestines probably wont turn inside out. The 10 min shake plus letting it set for 30 mins before drinking is a bit much. I try to fill up water bottles before I need them so they have time slosh around in my pack while I'm walking so I have clean water by the time I stop for supper.
customer_reviews.author: fundabug

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like bleach.
customer_reviews.text: Even my boyfriend, who isn't nearly as picky about water as me, couldn't handle drinking the water after putting one tablet in. We shook it for the amount of time it said, if not more, which is very tedious btw. It was unpalatable.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Mickelson

customer_reviews.title: What do I know?  :)
customer_reviews.text: I got the same reading two seperate times so I assume the are right. I may try another brand to see if I get the same readings. Not because I doubt these but it seems smart to have a comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Product Expiration
customer_reviews.text: Listed description says 5 years but product received is just over 4 years before expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: every tablet is for 0.75 L
customer_reviews.text: Very unusual volume in the USA. Why not a gallon or 1 pint or even 1 l? Should we all save wine bottles?
customer_reviews.author: Bama Boy

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and works
customer_reviews.text: Use these hiking, backpacking, and camping. We use pond or creek water in a jug, add tablet, and shake. We then put that chemically cleaned water into our survival filtered water bottles (to remove the chemicals). We have not gotten sick. Sooo much easier than carrying a bunch of water!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Have not had to use any yet so cant say anything for the taste, but they do have a long Expiration date on them so that's a 5 star
customer_reviews.author: scott k.

customer_reviews.title: A quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Great to have in the car, the camper or the boat. In case of an emergency, they provide a great option to use available water to make it drinkable. Have stashed some aside just in case.......
customer_reviews.author: Mike on the 45th Parallel in northern Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I need, but aluminum packets would be better
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my go bags. Dont like the idea of having to carry heavy water bags, so an empty canteen, a few puritabs and we are good to go. Just wish they came in waterproof aluminum packets instead of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Connor McKenzy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, clear instructions. I liked that they are in blister packs - so you can easily divide the 100 tablets amongst a couple people if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Davis

customer_reviews.title: I have taken these on multiple backpacking trips to treat water and have yet to get sick so I assume they work great from the water I've been drinking
customer_reviews.text: The produce came very well packaged. I have taken these on multiple backpacking trips to treat water and have yet to get sick so I assume they work great from the water I've been drinking. The individual packages are sometimes hard to open that's why it didn't get 5 stars. I assume this is to help it stay fresh but it is still an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Maasen

customer_reviews.title: Put them away for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Great for first aid bag, survival kit, backpacking, bug-out bag, glove box, or anywhere you might face the need to drink questionable water. This is one of those items that can save your life years after you bought it. They work, so don't worry about effectiveness. Light chemical taste, but I prefer that over diarrhea and death.
customer_reviews.author: R. Xadian

customer_reviews.title: Ordered from another company before and came in the original ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered from another company before and came in the original sealed bag from aqua tabs, these came in a zip lock with the individual paper sachets exposed. Not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gary

customer_reviews.title: Need on hand.  Just incase.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Date is good for a 15 months. Till 2023. July
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Whigham

customer_reviews.title: Essential for preparing for any emergency
customer_reviews.text: A must for camping or emergency. Buy with water storage bags.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Louchis

customer_reviews.title: Good price good products
customer_reviews.text: For me, the price was right. These seem to be good and have a long storage life,5year believe it's advertised. I recommend some, for camping and Bug Out bags.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle D

customer_reviews.title: Go Bag Supply
customer_reviews.text: Added these to my family's Go Bags. Great price for so many. Glad they are individually packaged. I just wish the instructions were printed on each tablet's packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: A good buy 👍
customer_reviews.text: I bought these imcase of a emergency. I like the individual packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Octavius Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Water Purification Tablets
customer_reviews.text: Another item for TO GO emergency kit. Hope to never have to use them. Cannot review on its flavor but I can see they are easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to carry. Good to have around for emergencies. I can’t taste a difference in the water after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kirk

customer_reviews.title: For Emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these tabs for our "emergency go bag." Haven't opened or used any. Wonder about the ingredients but in an emergency might be adequate. Purchased some individual personal water filters "Lifestraw" Yes, will share!
customer_reviews.author: 3AMAZON Customers

customer_reviews.title: Package size
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller packaging than I expected (8.5x5 inches) which makes it super easy to stock up on and store. Ultra thin also! Hope these work when SHTF ☺ Also, comes in a waterproof package. Not sure about the individuals as I am not planning on opening it until needed.
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: Mix and let stand, that's all. So Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use with minimal steps to follow, making easy to remember instructions for any situation needing potable water. Bought these for my husband's "survival" bag. Very pleased. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Clean, safe water in every country
customer_reviews.text: I travel to countries that it is advisable to avoid drinking tap water. I mix it in the morning in a recycled liter water bottle and I have safe drinking water in 30 minutes. It is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Yemoot

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I use them to store my prescriptions instead ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I use them to store my prescriptions instead of bulky different sized bottles. I peel off the stickers from my prescriptions and stick them on the plastic bags. Won’t hold large quantity of large pills but holds a month supply of smaller pills great!

customer_reviews.title: Not like the origional order.
customer_reviews.text: These are much smaller than the previous order I need to use more of them. Pills are much smaller and are hard to get out of the package.

customer_reviews.title: Keep on hand
customer_reviews.text: we put these in all of our first aid kits in the cars, our camping gear, etc.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I thought it could be used on smaller amounts of water. Never used.

customer_reviews.title: Aquatabs
customer_reviews.text: I got them pretty quick and being honest there not that bad you can taste the difference in the water

customer_reviews.title: Clean water in a tablet in minutes
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenience of having the tablets ready during weather disasters with a lack of clean water

customer_reviews.title: Survival supplies
customer_reviews.text: Under the theory of innocent till proven guilty I have to say wait and see. I bought two packages and but them in lockers with survival food.

customer_reviews.title: first response kit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these tablets for inclusion into a new first responder kit that I am putting together. Compact size, easy to fit.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. Individual packaged is the way to go. Have them in all my bags in car in truck in camper in go bag

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: tablets sometimes turn in to dust trying to get them out of the packaging

customer_reviews.title: "Packs" vs "tablets" misleading
customer_reviews.text: Although I recieved exactly what the picture shows, it is counting the amount of tablets you get. It says 100 packs. A little misleading!!
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, good condition and they work. Not much more to say

customer_reviews.title: WHATS TO KNOW, IF YOU NEED CLEAN WATER TO DRINK IN AN EMERGENCY, WELL YOU'VE GOT IT!

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Match Image - Unregulated Product!
customer_reviews.text: What I received does NOT match the image of the listing. According to the manufacturer of Aquatabs, Kersia, I received unregulated product. Buyer BEWARE!

customer_reviews.title: WAY Better than iodine tabs
customer_reviews.text: Did the job. Clean taste free water, close to. Small light easy to pack better than iodine tabs

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked that the pills showed absolutely no decrease in ppm reading after following the instructions twice. I wondered if the heat had any effect on the pills. My ppm reading device worked on other water tests before and after.
customer_reviews.author: kevin mackie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Everything came quickly and was what was expected/promised. I haven't used this product, as it's for our hurricane kit, as a just incase. But everything came quickly and is what was promised.

customer_reviews.title: Flavourless
customer_reviews.text: Can't even tell you put it in there. Water tastes great.

customer_reviews.title: Great item

customer_reviews.title: highly recomend

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I refilled my 32oz water bottle from a stream in the Smokies. Slight chlorine taste, but I didn’t get diarrhea so that’s great!

customer_reviews.title: A+ seller and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted for emergencies! Sure seems easy and I feel safer having them!

customer_reviews.title: Great to have in emergencies as well 3rd world travel.
customer_reviews.text: Great to have in emergencies as well 3rd world travel.

customer_reviews.text: Ill let you know when I have to use them but the price was right and these will store with out emergency supplies just fine.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use these yet, purchased them for our emergency kit. They come packaged very compactly and are lightweight! Perfect fit!

customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, product is a must for camping, hiking or bug out bag. Thanks!

customer_reviews.text: What can you say about water purification tabs? In some cases they can save you a lot of misery. Maybe save your life if things get too bad

customer_reviews.title: Great pack. Used and never got sick
customer_reviews.text: Great pack. Used and never got sick. No too strong tasting. Will buy again as needed.

customer_reviews.text: Arrived as stated, well packaged and will serve as backup to our Life Defender Elite Pump Filter. Easy to store in the bear canister with our food to stay dry and safe.

customer_reviews.title: Solid product. Way better than iodine.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great price! Shipping took a bit, but nothing crazy. Will definitely buy again.

customer_reviews.title: For emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should own some of these just in case for emergencies.

customer_reviews.title: They don’t last long....
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Plantronics (this exact type and brand) and they both have the same issue. They work fine for a month or two and then start having major issues like crackling or only having sound in one ear. The problems increase and get worse. Typically this type of issue is caused by bent or damaged wires but mine are pristine and since this seems to have happened to two in a row this is likely a manufacturer issue. I would not recommend these....
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Water tasted like water. What else can you ask for.

product_meta.title: Aquatabs 100 Pack - World's #1 Water Purification Tablets
product_meta.description: For over 100 years, chlorination of drinking water has been one of the single most effective means of improving public health in the developing world. It was with this in mind over 20 years ago, the research and development team at Medentech set out to create a unique product that could offer the benefits of chlorinated water in an easy to use and affordable product. As a result, Aquatabs was created and is now the most trusted brand of choice for point of use water disinfection around the world. Why use Aquatabs to treat water? 1. Many water sources throughout the world, even after filtration, remain contaminated and require some form of disinfection. 2. Aquatabs enable areas without access to water disinfection systems to benefit from the advantages of chlorination without any infrastructure requirements in a speedy and cost effective manner. 3. Aquatabs are simple to use, easily transported, cost effective and affordable to low income groups. 4. Aquatabs water purification tablets utilize materials specifically approved to International standards for use in drinking water with NSF/ANSI Standard 60 certification. 5. Aquatabs have been evaluated and selected by leading Aid Agencies, Non Governmental Organizations and Defense Forces worldwide.
feature_bullets: Aquatabs are effervescent tablets which kill microorganisms in water to prevent cholera, typhoid, dysentery and other water borne diseases. Clean drinking water is ready in 30 mins.
In the past year over 1 billion Aquatabs have been used globally. Each package includes 100 individually sealed tablets with up to 5 year shelf life.
Aquatabs are used both in emergency situations and also for continuous use in households that do not have access to safe drinking water.
The only water purification tablet with NSF 60 certification and approved formula for routine use by the World Health Organization (WHO)
Maximize shelf-life with water-proof / light-proof standup pouch. Instructions included.
